from fractions import gcd
def check(A,B):
    hcf = gcd(A,B)
    if B > 1 and hcf == 1:
        return False
    b = B/hcf
    if hcf % b == 0:
        return True
    if check (hcf,b) ==  True:
        return True
    return False
_ = int(raw_input())
for __ in range(_):
    A,B = map(int,raw_input().split())
    if B%2== 0 and A%2 == 1:
        print "No"
        continue
    if check(A,B) == True:
        print "Yes"
    else:
        print "No"
